name: Ricetta: Vieni a prenderlo!
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Come and Get It.

value.text: Purchase from Chef Mao at Wanmin Restaurant

customize.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Pesce
customize.desc: Un filetto di pesce fresco. Se trattato in modo appropriato, pu√≤ diventare un piatto prelibato.

customize.name: Riso
customize.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

customize.name: Tofu
customize.desc: Freshly made bean product that has a silky-smooth tender texture.

customize.name: Vieni a prenderlo!
customize.desc: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients. There is no great refinement in the making of this food, and it appears in Liyue often during festival season. Whenever this dish is served up, the person at the head of the table will invite everyone to dig in, saying "Come on, eat, eat," hence the name.
